Texts.Chs: 恰恰拉有项科技，有项有用的隐形科技。你可以拥有这项科技，代价是...^green;给恰恰拉带^orange;5颗钻石^reset;，然后恰恰拉会为你展示^orange;隐形技术^reset;的测试。
Texts.Eng: Chacharra has tech, useful tech to go invisible. You can have tech, for price... ^green;Bring Chacharra ^orange;5 Diamonds^reset;, then Chacharra show you test course for ^orange;Stealth Tech^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 你让恰恰拉快乐，快乐阿基帮助你！^orange;隐形技术^reset;现在完全是你的了...
Texts.Eng: You make Chacharra happy, happy Akki help you! ^orange;Stealth Tech ^reset;almost yours now...
